titleStmt.title: The resurrection of John Lilburne, now a prisoner in Dover-Castle, declared and manifested in these following lines penned by himself, and now at his desire published in print in these following words.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, with remarkable additions by way of appendex.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert at the Black Spread Eagle, neer the west-end of Pauls.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
